title: Rebrand UI to Adwait Loop with new “A” logo

requirements.summary: Add new Adwait Loop “A” logo mark and matching wordmark as generated static assets.
acceptanceCriteria: New image files exist at the specified filenames in frontend/public/assets/generated.
The logo is visually an “A” mark (not the previous looping/spiral motif).
The wordmark reads “Adwait Loop” and matches the logo’s style (consistent color/line/weight).

file_operations.description: Add the generated minimal “A” logo mark image asset (transparent background) at this exact path and filename.
Add the generated “Adwait Loop” wordmark image asset (transparent background) at this exact path and filename.

requirements.summary: Update AppShell header to use the new Adwait Loop logo/wordmark assets and alt text.
acceptanceCriteria: AppShell header no longer references /assets/generated/logic-looper-logo.dim_512x512.png or /assets/generated/logic-looper-wordmark.dim_1200x300.png.
Header images render correctly on desktop and mobile breakpoints.
Both header image alt texts reference “Adwait Loop” (or “Adwait Loop logo/wordmark”).

file_operations.description: Replace header branding image src values to use frontend/public/assets/generated/adwait-loop-a-logo.dim_512x512.png and frontend/public/assets/generated/adwait-loop-wordmark.dim_1200x300.png, and update img alt text to reference “Adwait Loop”.

requirements.summary: Replace remaining user-facing “Logic Looper” strings with “Adwait Loop” (Home heading, footer label, browser tab title).
acceptanceCriteria: Home page heading no longer says “Welcome to Logic Looper”.
AppShell footer no longer says “Logic Looper”.
No new user-facing text is introduced in any language other than English.

file_operations.description: Update the document <title> text from “Logic Looper” to “Adwait Loop”.
Update the visible Home page welcome heading text from “Welcome to Logic Looper” to “Welcome to Adwait Loop”.
Update the footer copyright label to replace “Logic Looper” with “Adwait Loop” while keeping the rest of the footer behavior unchanged.
